name: Cure (MrOkur)
description:
Final Project for Introduction to Game Engines and Fundamentals of Game Design 2

Cure is 2D-Adventure game.

How To Play

  • WASD or Arrow keys to move
  • Space Bar to jump
  • Left Mouse Click to fire

Prepared By

  • Ömer Faruk Okur (Level Design/Script )
  • Görkem Utku Yıldız (Level Design/Script)
  • Utku Karaçoçuk (Story Telling)
  • Süleyman Azar (Assets)
  • Muhammed Hazar Dayan (Assets)
